nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS POSSIBLE THROUGH TODAY OVER PARTS OF COASTAL WEST-CENTRAL MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS POSSIBLE ACROSS PORTIONS OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR TUESDAY NIGHT AND WEDNESDAY...
summary: ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS POSSIBLE THROUGH TODAY OVER PARTS OF COASTAL WEST-CENTRAL MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS POSSIBLE ACROSS PORTIONS OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR TUESDAY NIGHT AND WEDNESDAY... As of 2:00 PM MST Mon Oct 06 the center of Priscilla was located near 18.3, -108.0 with movement NNW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 972 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS POSSIBLE THROUGH TODAY OVER PARTS OF COASTAL WEST-CENTRAL MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS POSSIBLE ACROSS PORTIONS OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR TUESDAY NIGHT AND WEDNESDAY... As of 2:00 PM MST Mon Oct 06 the center of Priscilla was located near 18.3, -108.0 with movement NNW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 972 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
